author: Deborah Reddihough
method: Melt the butter and stir in the flour. Cook for 2 minutes and then stir in the milk. Bring to the boil, stirring all the time, and simmer gently for 10 minutes. Stir in the brandy (or rum) and the sugar and serve with Christmas pudding.
ingredients: 55g/2oz butter,  55g/2oz plain flour,  570ml/1 pint milk,  4 tbsp brandy or dark rum,  55g/2oz caster sugar
